text: This list of best-selling films in the United States is a list of the best- selling home video film titles sold in the United States. This list does not include digital purchases or video rentals. ==Best-selling films== This is a list of the best-selling film titles sold in the United States across all home video formats, including VHS, DVD, and Blu-ray Disc (BD). {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Title ! Video release ! All formats ! VHS ! DVD ! Blu-ray !
